Prophet.Commentary: Abraham set seven ewe lambs of the flock by themselves. Abimelech said unto Abraham, What mean these seven ewe lambs which you have set by themselves? He said, For these seven ewe lambs shall you take of my hand, that they may be a witness unto me, that I have digged this well (Genesis 21:28-30).
